backend/main.mo: Implements a canister storing contact form submissions in a Map with functions to submit, list, and fetch submissions.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata describing two blog‑related features and their associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing summarized descriptions of various frontend components and pages.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide detailing production identifier and checklists for theme, blog page, routes, and general verification.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes and applies global background and text rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting SEO metadata and loading the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes for all site pages and wraps them with the main layout.
frontend/src/components/common/Container: Simple layout wrapper adding consistent horizontal padding and max‑width.
frontend/src/components/common/GradientB: Transparent structural wrapper component maintaining spacing without visual gradients.
Reusable card component displaying a title, optional description, icon, and children.
frontend/src/components/common/OceanAnim: Renders static and animated ocean wave layers plus a readability overlay.
frontend/src/components/common/ProfilePo: Portrait component with gradient border, shadow, and size options.
frontend/src/components/common/ShareSite: Card that displays the site URL and provides copy‑to‑clipboard and open‑in‑new‑tab actions.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: Full contact form with validation, controlled fields, and submission via useSubmitContactForm hook.
frontend/src/components/contact/SubmitSt: Renders success or error alerts after submitting a contact form based on status flags and error message.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Displays the homepage hero with name, tagline, description, stats, and CTA buttons for portfolio and contact pages.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Provides responsive site navigation with desktop links and a mobile sheet menu, highlighting the active route.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Shows footer with branding, quick links, contact prompt, copyright, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Wraps the site with animated background, header, routed content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Projec: Implements a tabbed filter allowing users to select project categories.
Displays a grid of project cards showing titles, descriptions, tools, and optional external links.
frontend/src/components/skills/SkillCate: Renders a skill category card containing multiple skill meters.
frontend/src/components/skills/SkillMete: Shows a labeled progress bar representing a skill level percentage.
frontend/src/components/skills/SkillsDet: Outputs detailed skill sections with images, descriptions, and key areas using data from skillsDetails.
frontend/src/data/projects.ts: Defines the Project interface and exports a list of categorized project entries with descriptions, tools, and optional links.
frontend/src/data/skillsDetails.ts: Defines the SkillDetail interface and exports a detailed list of skill categories with associated metadata and image paths.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the user's identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
Wraps a mutation that submits contact form data through the backend actor and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind CSS base styles, theme variables, dark mode, and animated ocean background effects.
frontend/src/lib/emailValidation.ts: Exports a simple regex-based email validation function.
frontend/src/lib/portrait.ts: Defines centralized portrait image source and alt text constants.
frontend/src/lib/seo.ts: Provides a helper to set document title and meta tags for SEO and Open Graph data.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with SEO setup, profile portrait, highlights, and descriptive bio content.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPage.tsx: Renders a blog landing page with SEO setup and multiple themed blog sections displayed in card layouts.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays a contact form, contact information, and sets SEO metadata for the contact page.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Sets homepage SEO metadata and renders the hero section.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: Shows a filterable portfolio grid with skills details and sets portfolio SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Renders a list of service info cards with a CTA section and sets services SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/SkillsPage.tsx: Displays detailed skills information and configures SEO for the skills page.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s versioned state, describing theme changes, page updates, image requirements, and known issues for a multi‑page portfolio rebuild. Contains architectural notes and existing feature records guiding the site’s updates and deployment.
